references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), a foundational work in novel view synthesis that heavily influenced the current research.

references.paper_title: A practical model for subsurface light transport
references.reason: This paper presents a practical model for subsurface scattering, a key phenomenon addressed in the current work, providing essential background for the research.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, the core rendering method extended in this work, providing essential technical foundation for the research.

references.paper_title: Relightable 3D Gaussian: Real-time point cloud relighting with BRDF decomposition and ray tracing
references.reason: This paper extends 3D Gaussian splatting with PBR material decomposition and real-time relighting, directly inspiring the current research and providing a close baseline.

references.paper_title: Learning object-centric neural scattering functions for free-viewpoint relighting and scene composition
references.reason: This paper introduces an object-centric approach to neural scattering functions, offering a comparable technique to the current research with different strengths and weaknesses.
